_sText:
_________________________________________________________________________________________________ Surf_animals __________________________________________________________________________________________________ Look my other submissions Here! [EDIT] There seems to be some bugs with the jail on some servers... This map stands in honour of a fallen legend: Pablo aka AmstaFF!
It makes the server lagg when ppl go to jail. We work hardly to figure it out and update the map soonly! don't rate poorly because of this shit bug. Here fast download for servers!! Please do not asses the map by the look of the pictures! There is so much more to it so you have to download it to see the look and feel! Video by Nitro <3 Map idea by Razer Map system,decals and Models by AmstaFF skybox by AmstaFF Map started nearly half a year ago. The map has been so carefully optimized but we appologize for the map size. You have 12 stages + bonus. 7 min timer to beat all. If come to the end of map and beat it you get to a control board for a driveable shark. When finish bonus you get unlimited hp and an m249. Other normal jail is the catsle in the pic. Normal jail is fy map and has many guns. Beta testers: Nikki copy-mark Nitro Sangre Grueddi Skar Nochmehrnoob RyanS Krusty Toaster WireleZZ Black Sheep Surf-Velocity clan Many thanks to surf Velocity and wireleZZ for beta test and advice. Also thx to Note2 Ip for surf-Velocity server #1: 84.244.162.226:27015 Enjoy the map! PS: This is the real release... There was a fake out yesterday and we appologize for that :)
